name: Island of Captivity
description:
The user has been placed on an island with the objective of escaping the island. Previous challengers haven't been as successful, with only a minuscule minority finding a way out. The crazed man on the island attempts to stop the user from escaping, and ultimately wants to stop them from releasing the various captives on the island.

The user will need to walk, run, jump and click his way through the island in order to reach the end, and essentially escape the wrath of the crazed man.
